message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $650,000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $650,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $700,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to propose a price of $675,000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $675,000. I'm willing to compromise again and offer the product to you for $680,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to propose a price of $677,500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $677,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $682,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $679,000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $679,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $685,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. I would like to propose a price of $683,000 for the product.
